description: THIS REQUEST IS RESERVED FOR HOLDERS OF SUPPLY ARRANGEMENT # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY, FOR THE PURCHASE OF LABORATORY AND SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT, PARTS AND ACCESSORIES, SERVICES AND SUPPLIES. Suppliers that do not have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada, cannot submit a bid. Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is looking to purchase one (1) Dropping Point System. In addition to the purchase, installation of the unit and training on how to use the unit is required.
full_summary:
---

### Dropping Point System Purchase
#### Solicitation #1000418676B

The Canada Border Service Agency (CBSA) has published a solicitation for the purchase of a Drip Point System. This announcement is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI.

#### Key Information

*   **Solicitation Number**: 1000418676B
*   **Reference Number**: CB-7938-1678679
*   **Publication Date**: August 8, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: September 18, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: September 19, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: December 31, 2023
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada, National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Tender Description

The CBSA is looking to purchase one (1) Drip Point System, including the installation of the unit and training on its use.

#### Solicitation Evaluation Criteria

*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Eligibility Requirements

*   Only Suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI are eligible to bid.

#### How to Qualify for the Arrangement

*   Interested Suppliers can download Solicitation Document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submit a response in accordance with the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

#### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Vikki McMurren
*   **Contact Email**: [CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca)
*   **Contact Phone**: (519) 613-5715
*   **Contact Fax**: N/A

#### Attachment

The tender document is available for download from the following link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7938/1000418676---npp---en_fr.pdf
